SystemDB.Name: SystemDB
SystemDB.Description: ParadigmREVOLUTION internal system database, core application graphs, definitions, and blueprints are stored in here

Graph.Name: Graph
Graph.Description: Contains all the defined System Graphs

Tasks.Name: Tasks
Tasks.Description: Contains all the defined Tasks (in old terms, this is the module)

PageLayout.Name: PageLayout
PageLayout.Description: Contains all the defined PageLayout within a Task(in old terms, this is the program.php)

Form.Name: Form
Form.Description: Contains all the defined Forms for a specific PageLayout within a Task(in old terms, this is part of the forms.json)

Schema.Name: Schema
Schema.Description: Contains all the defined Schemas for the given Form within a Task(in old terms, this is the other part of the forms.json)

DataDB.Name: DataDB
DataDB.Description: ParadigmREVOLUTION internal application data database is stored in here
